name: Secure Coding Suite
description: Complete security policy with environment protection, credential validation, audit logging, and data scanning for Claude Code

packages.reason: Blocks writes to sensitive files (.env, .pem, .key) to prevent credential exposure
Warns when hardcoded credentials detected in code (passwords, API keys, tokens)
Logs all file deletion operations for audit trail and compliance
Scans for AWS keys, private keys, JWT tokens, and other sensitive data patterns
